lead_paragraph: By beating highly regarded West Virginia, the No. 4 Boilermakers made a case for consideration among college basketball’s elite.
snippet: By beating highly regarded West Virginia, the No. 4 Boilermakers made a case for consideration among college basketball’s elite.

headline.main: In Their Own Quiet Way, Boilermakers Are Making Some Noise
headline.seo: Purdue Makes Modest Noise by Beating West Virginia
headline.print_headline: In Their Own Quiet Way, Boilermakers Are Making Some Noise
